entry.title: FREEZER COOKIES 🍪 Freeze your cookie dough to have freshly baked cookies whenever you want!😋 I used the “levain style cookie” recipe by @justine_snacks and it was amazing!🫶 RECIPE (6 cookies, 15min prep time): -175g flour -40g corn starch -1 Tsp baking p
